dependencies: Python: boto3 installed in container build (pip install boto3) (/Dockerfile)
deployment_relevant_files: /build.sh (build+push to ECR, updates pod manifest image)
architectural_resources: Containerized CLI utility (epicac) used as AWS credential_process
Amazon EKS Pod Identity (implied by env vars AWS_CONTAINER_CREDENTIALS_FULL_URI and AWS_CONTAINER_AUTHORIZATION_TOKEN_FILE in src/main.rs)
AWS STS AssumeRole / cross-account role chaining (described in README.md and aws-config)
Amazon ECR repository for container images (implied by build.sh docker login/push)
Amazon S3 access from example app (boto3 list_buckets in example.py)
GitHub Actions CI/CD pipeline for building/releasing Rust binaries (release.yml)
